name: Everbloom
intro: Invest in YouTube creators and share in their success
introduce: Everbloom is a platform that allows you to back YouTube creators and share in their success. Anyone who purchases a creator's token will receive a specified share of that creator's YouTube earnings for the specified scope and contract period. Revenue shares are distributed quarterly. Purchases can also unlock exclusive perks, access to the creator’s community, and let users contribute to future projects.
